Class BooleanColumn

  • java.lang.Object
    • StockManager.SimpleDatabase.Columns.Column
      • StockManager.SimpleDatabase.Columns.BooleanColumn

  • public class BooleanColumn
extends Column
    A vanilla Boolean column type for SimpleDB DataObjects.
    Since:
    09/11/2015
